pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysing 'SNP' Data to Support Captive Breeding // Functions are provided that facilitate the analysis of SNP (single nucleotide polymorphism) data to answer questions regarding captive breeding and relatedness between individuals. 'dartR.captive' is part of the 'dartRverse' suit of packages. Gruber et al. (2018) doi:10.1111/1755-0998.12745. Mijangos et al. (2022) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13918.
